title: Left-Click Not Working [Patch 5.24]
body:
Ever since the new patch, my left click has ceased to fully work. 

What I can do:
I can still click on abilities to prepare to cast them, 
I can click within the shop

What I cant do:
Am unable to actually CAST normal cast abilities.
I cant click on the shop to open it
I cant click allies or enemies to view stats 
I cant click on the mini-map to re-position the camera


It seems that all previous left click functions have been changed to my middle mouse button which is very annoying. 
I have played with my input.ini folder before, but have since been able to use my left click in game. Just in case, I reverted it back to the original, but it's still not working.

replies.body:
Thats works - thanks Wuks.

The only dif is the config folder is OCe not na

Hey HighlyStrung82,

Could you try the following?

Close League.
Go to C:\Riot Games\league of Legends\RADS\projects
Delete the Delete the lol_air_config_na folder
Restart the client to redownload it.
Log into NA
Go to C:\Riot Games\league of Legends\config
Delete PersistedSettings.json, game.cfg and input.ini
Create a custom game to test it.

Same it's killing me!!! I can't use any normal cast abilities

Any one have any idea please?
